Exploring Luxury Escapes at HarborHouse Hotels Embark on a journey through our luxurious accommodations. CONTACT US Explore Our Travel Guide Discover essential tips and insights for your next getaway adventure. Experience the freedom and simplicity of living off-grid aboard a HarborHouse hotel. Navigating Europe's Scenic Waterways Embark on a journey through Europe's historic canals and picturesque rivers aboard a HarborHouse HarborHouse hotel. Embracing Off-Grid Living: The HarborHouse hotel Lifestyle Discover the freedom and simplicity of living off-grid aboard a HarborHouse HarborHouse hotel. Experience the HarborHouse Difference Immerse yourself in the luxurious ambiance of HarborHouse hotels and resorts. Explore the freedom to discover breathtaking coastal views and scenic landscapes. Indulge in ultimate relaxation as you unwind in our elegant accommodations. Create timeless memories with loved ones in the embrace of our exquisite hospitality. Rejuvenate your senses amidst the comfort and sophistication of HarborHouse properties. Embark on unforgettable journeys and explore new horizons with HarborHouse. Reserve your HarborHouse experience today and embark on a journey of unparalleled luxury. Join us in celebrating the beauty and serenity of life at HarborHouse hotels and resorts. pages.disclaimers: HarborHouse Disclaimers - Policies and Terms HarborHouse HOME ABOUT US Hotels Contact Disclaimer The information contained on this website (the "Website") is for general informational purposes only. This disclaimer applies to any damages or injury caused by any errors or omissions in the information, as well as by any use of the information. By accessing this Website, you agree to indemnify and hold harmless HarborHouse, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any and all claims, liabilities, damages, losses, or expenses, including reasonable attorney's fees, arising out of or in any way connected with your use of the Website. External Links This Website may contain links to other websites ("External Links"). HarborHouse is not responsible for the content of any External Links. The inclusion of a link on this Website does not imply endorsement by HarborHouse of the website or the products or services offered thereon. Limitation of Liability In no event will HarborHouse be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages) arising out of or in connection with your use of this Website. Revisions HarborHouse reserves the right to revise this Disclaimer at any time by amending this page. You are expected to check this page from time to time to take notice of any changes we make, as you are bound by any such revisions. Your continued use of this Website after any changes to this Disclaimer will constitute your acceptance of such changes. pages.privacy-policy: HarborHouse Privacy Policy - Your Privacy Matters HarborHouse HOME ABOUT US Hotels Contact Privacy Policy At HarborHouse, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information we collect, how we use it, and the steps we take to protect your information. Information We Collect We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment details when you make a reservation or interact with our website. How We Use Your Information We use your information to process reservations, communicate with you, improve our services, and personalize your experience. We may also use your information for marketing purposes with your consent. Sharing Your Information We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with trusted partners and service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing services to you. Security Measures We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. Changes to This Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be reflected on this page, and your continued use of our website signifies your acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy. The HarborHouse website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline HarborHouse HOTELS HOME ABOUT US PRIVACY AND POLICY DISCLAIMERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS

pages.terms-conditions: HarborHouse Terms and Conditions - Clear Guidelines for Your Stay HarborHouse HOME ABOUT US Hotels Contact Terms and Conditions Welcome to HarborHouse. By accessing and using our website, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions: Reservation and Payment Reservations made through our website are subject to availability and confirmation. Payment details provided during the reservation process must be valid and accurate. Cancellation and Refund Policy Cancellation policies vary depending on the type of reservation and rate selected. Please refer to your booking confirmation for details. Refunds, if applicable, will be processed in accordance with our refund policy. Use of Website Our website and its content are provided for informational purposes only. You may not use our website for any unlawful or prohibited purpose, or to violate any laws or regulations. Intellectual Property All content on our website, including text, images, logos, and trademarks, is the property of HarborHouse or its licensors and is protected by copyright laws. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content without our express permission. Disclaimer While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of our website or the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. Changes to Terms and Conditions We reserve the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. The HarborHouse website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.thanks: Thank You for Choosing HarborHouse - Your Comfort is Our Priority HarborHouse HOME ABOUT US Hotels Contact Thank You for Choosing HarborHouse We sincerely hope that your time with us was nothing short of exceptional. Our team is dedicated to providing you with the highest level of hospitality, and your comfort is always our top priority. If there was anything specific that made your stay memorable, or if there are areas where we can improve, please don't hesitate to let us know. Your feedback is invaluable to us as we continually strive to enhance our services and exceed your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back to HarborHouse in the near future. Until then, please feel free to reach out to us if you have any questions or if there's anything else we can assist you with. Your satisfaction is our greatest reward. The HarborHouse website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
